title: LH says attestation is seen before even though not sent before
body:
## Description

I'm using a load balancer (https://github.com/TennisBowling/consensusbackup),
and then I use a lighthouse vc to connect to that
for the node list, I only provide the lighthouse node, which on attestations prints
`Jan 18 18:25:27.112 INFO Unaggregated attestation                validator: myval, src: api, slot: 2977925, epoch: 93060, delay_ms: 111, index: 57, head: 0x12cb58d1d43afd0e2c8a33176420b251c90fe7afcd62e752d88ff40835aff6b5, service: val_mon`
`Jan 18 18:25:27.119 ERRO Failure verifying attestation for gossip, attestation_slot: 2977925, committee_index: 57, request_index: 0, error: PriorAttestationKnown { validator_index: myval, epoch: Epoch(93060) }`
`Jan 18 18:25:27.123 WARN Error processing HTTP API request       method: POST, path: /eth/v1/beacon/pool/attestations, status: 400 Bad Request, elapsed: 275.6Âµs`

this problem doesn't happen when directly connecting the vc to the bn
and doesn't happen (or at least that I can see from the response) on teku and nimbus nodes
## Version

Lighthouse v2.0.1-fff01b2
BLS library: blst-modern
SHA256 hardware acceleration: true
Specs: mainnet (true), minimal (false)

using pre-compiled release

## Present Behaviour

Beacon node broadcasts attestation once

## Expected Behaviour

Beacon node broadcasts once and throws error about broadcasting twice

## Steps to resolve

run consensusbackup, set lighthouse as the node to use, point bn at localhost:8000
attestations will still finalize but the error persists
